channel.title: Movie/game/anything ratings are gay
channel.description: I was thinking, say there is a PG 13 movie. I would understand if a 5 year old wouldn't be allowed to watch it, but think about it. If your birthday is 1 day away, and you are 12, and you wanna watch a PG 13 movie who is to say you can't? I think its a load of bullshit that people think that in a little amount of time someone is supposed to mature. I think the maturity level of the person should determine what you can't and cannot do.

item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:35, topic:168372”][quote author=Zach1188 link=topic=227979.msg2062042#msg2062042 date=1203340968]
I find it ironic how you can’t, for example, buy the Family Guy movie/seasons at most stores if you’re under 18, however it’s on public TV.
[/quote]
That’s the parent’s choice to moderate what their kids are watching. They could be watching porn for all they know.[/quote]
then they probably know right.

item.title: Movie/game/anything ratings are gay
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:4, topic:168372”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=227979.msg1957540#msg1957540 date=1198824105]
sad cuzz u can’t see a pg 13 movie? oh fucking well, you shoulda lied and said you were 13, they wouldn’t of known.
[/quote]

You won’t shut up will you? Im 17, i just cant watch R rated movies yet (need to be 18 in canada)[/quote]

Er, I live in Canada. And I’ve gone to see R rated movies since I was little. Sucks for you I guess.

Reminds me of the time Wal-Mart wouldn’t sell me San Andreas. Anyways I agree with you though. I understand that many of these ratings are just to protect children. But thats the parents job.

Read full topic

item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

On another topic

And also… Why does the world seem to think the word “gay”, roughly translated, means stupid?

Because that is the way we use it, and it clearly conveys the message, which is the point of language.

item.title: Movie/game/anything ratings are gay

item.description:

[quote=“the fu superior, post:1, topic:168372”]I was thinking, say there is a PG 13 movie. I would understand if a 5 year old wouldn’t be allowed to watch it, but think about it. If your birthday is 1 day away, and you are 12, and you wanna watch a PG 13 movie who is to say you can’t? I think its a load of bullshit that people think that in a little amount of time someone is supposed to mature.
I think the maturity level of the person should determine what you can’t and cannot do.[/quote]

Working out someones maturity level is so much hassle; an age limit is simple and easy and works (usually).

Anyway, I guess from this thread you got turned away from a film because you were too young? Am I right?
